(1 ARP = ₹ 0.25) Membership benefits Avail complimentary memberships for Travel, Lifestyle & Wellness.

priviledges.title: Memberships - The AURUM Way

Your complimentary gateway to luxury With AURUM, indulge in profound luxurious experiences with a complimentary 1-year Club Marriott Membership.     Stay ahead of the curve Stay in touch with the events of the world as they happen, with complimentary 1-year digital subscriptions to The Wall Street Journal and Mint. priviledges.title: The AURUM Welcome
priviledges.descFront: With exclusive privileges and an array of indulgent rewards to choose from, AURUM ensures that every reward point is well-spent. Reward benefits Get 40,000 AURUM Reward Points (ARP) equivalent to ₹ 10,000 on payment of joining fee. (1 ARP = ₹ 0.25) Membership benefits Avail complimentary memberships for Travel, Lifestyle & Wellness.

priviledges.title: Memberships - The AURUM Way
priviledges.descFront: To complement your refined lifestyle and unparalleled taste, we bring to you an array of memberships with AURUM. Your complimentary gateway to luxury With AURUM, indulge in profound luxurious experiences with a complimentary 1-year Club Marriott Membership.     Stay ahead of the curve Stay in touch with the events of the world as they happen, with complimentary 1-year digital subscriptions to The Wall Street Journal and Mint. Complementary Access to Angel Investment Network Embrace the role of an Angel Investor with 1-year complimentary membership to Inflection Point Venture(IPV), worth Rs.29,382.

priviledges.title: Travel
priviledges.descFront: Get complimentary DreamFolks Membership and enjoy unlimited complimentary access to 1000+ International Airport Lounges, along with complimentary visit, once a quarter, for a guest Enjoy the exclusive privilege of the low forex mark-up of 1.99% on international transactions
priviledges.descBack: 4 complimentary Domestic Airport Lounge visits per quarter One complimentary Spa access at select airports every quarter within India

priviledges.title: AURUM Golf Privillege
priviledges.descFront: Tee off with AURUM Enjoy 16 complimentary golf rounds per calendar year (4 per quarter) Master the greens with 12 complimentary golf lessons per calendar year

priviledges.title: AURUM - Book my Show

Get 4 movie tickets worth ₹ 1,000 every month on bookmyshow.com 2 free tickets applicable per booking. Maximum discount of ₹ 500 per booking (₹ 250 per ticket) Minimum 24 hours gap required between 2 bookings. Convenience Fee charged, as applicable.

priviledges.title: Domestic Airport Lounge access
priviledges.alt: Domestic Airport Lounge access on Lifestyle HC SBI Card Prime
priviledges.descFront: Enjoy 8 complimentary visits per year to Domestic Airport lounges (subject to a max of 2 per quarter)
priviledges.descBack: Cardholder’s are entitled for two (2) free Domestic visit in a quarter. Unutilized access will lapse at the end of quarter and cannot be carried to next quarter. In case a Cardholder accesses the airport lounge beyond complimentary visits, he/she will be charged as per the regular access rates prescribed by the lounge. Any accompanying guests (including children) with the Cardholder will be subject to a charge which will be made at the time of entry to the Cardholder

priviledges.title: Complimentary Priority Pass Membership

priviledges.descFront: Enjoy complimentary priority pass membership worth USD 99 & 4 complimentary visits per year (limited to 2 visits per quarter)
priviledges.descBack: Standard membership of Priority pass program is complimentary. details.name: SimplySAVE Advantage SBI Card
details.desc: Get more value on every purchase and increase your savings
features: Enjoy 10 Reward Points per Rs.150 spent on Dining, Movies, Departmental Stores and Grocery Spends
Annual fees reversal on spends of WebRupee Rs. 1,00,000 and above
1% fuel surcharge waiver across all petrol pumps
Annual savings - WebRupee Rs. 4,000*
Welcome Offer worth WebRupee Rs. 500**
10X rewards on Dining, Movies, Departmental stores and Grocery spends
1 Reward Point on every WebRupee Rs. 100 Spent
Fuel Surcharge waiver of up to WebRupee Rs. 100 every month
Adjust outstanding on the card with Reward Points. 4 Reward Points = WebRupee Rs. 1
Annual fee reversal on spends of >= WebRupee Rs. 90,000 in the previous year

* Assuming 2 Lakh Annual Spends with 40% Spends on 10X Categories.
**Get 2000 bonus Reward Points worth WebRupee Rs. 500 on spends of WebRupee Rs. 2,000 in first 60 days

priviledges.title: 10x Reward Points
priviledges.descFront:
Enjoy 10 Reward Points per WebRupee Rs 150 spent on Dining, Movies, Departmental Stores and Grocery Spends On all your other spends, earn 1 Reward Point per WebRupee Rs. 150 spent
(4 Reward Points = WebRupee Rs. 1)

priviledges.title: Worldwide Acceptance
priviledges.descFront: Your SimplySAVE Advantage SBI Card is an international credit card and is accepted in over 24 million outlets across the globe, including 3,25,000 outlets in India

priviledges.title: Enjoy Complete Fuel Freedom
priviledges.descFront: Get freedom from paying the 1% fuel surcharge at any petrol pump Transact an amount between WebRupee Rs. 500 to WebRupee Rs. 3,000 at any petrol pump in India to avail this offer
priviledges.descBack: You get maximum surcharge waiver of up to WebRupee Rs. 100 per statement cycle, on your SimplySAVE Advantage SBI Card

priviledges.title: Spend Based Reversal
priviledges.descFront: Get annual membership fee reversal from second year of your subscription To avail fee reversal, you need to have spent WebRupee Rs. 1,00,000 or more on your SimplySAVE Advantage SBI Card in the previous year
